name: Foraging Toys Parakeet Chewing Hanging Toy Shredded Paper Bird Cage Accessories for Conure Cockatiel Budgies Lovebird Parrotlet
short_description: 【Safe To Play】: These Parrot Cage Shredder toys are made of natural loofah, rattan balls,wood, stuffe with brightly colored crinkly papers which is very safe for your bird friends to chew. Hand-woven bird toys you can hide their treats in it which is an excellent selection for your pet friends who have a urge to chew and forage.

【Keep Active】:A busy Mr. or Mrs. bird is a happy Mr. or Mrs. bird.Those bird shredder toys are stuffed with brightly colored crinkly paper, which will catch bird's eyes immediately.And then they will pull them out just for great fun.It's a great chose to give your bird entertainment and physical exercise.

【The Bird Rope Perch】:The bird rope perch is made of the flexible, soft, durable, multi-colored cotton which is easy to connect to your bird cage.You can create different shape of perches for your lovely birds.

【Excellent for foraging】:Chewing and shredding is a bird natural behavior, which can improve your bird’s physical and emotional active.With the pretty colorful things to chew on,your birds will fall into a good way immediately, excellent for foraging.

【Easy to install】: All bird cage accessories toys come with a hook which can attach to the bird cage simply can provide hours of fun every day.Save space and a good decoration of your bird cage.Nice for small to medium birds,such as small parakeets, cockatiel, conures, macaws, parrots, love birds, Mynah, finches ,pineapple and so on.
product_description: If your birds are happily making a mess! If your lovebird loves paper . If your parakeet loves picking things like napkins and news paper. If your parakeets are crazy about crinkle paper! If your parakeets like to groom. If your African Grey Parrot likes ripping the paper up. If your bird enjoys ripping up paper and fighting with toys. If your parakeets have plucking issues. lovyCoCo shredding toy is a must have for your birds!! Made of brightly colored crinkly paper, which will keep your Mr. or Mrs. Bird friend entertains themself for hours! Your little guy will very happy to pull out the strips of paper.Or have hours of play time destroying these ,ripping them to pieces and playing with the stuffing.Or have a lot of fun to pulling the paper to line.Maybe they will even pluck the crimped paper and take it to his nest. It is so adorable.As for these guys who pluck their feathers, these products keep they occupied so he doesn’t have time to pluck. Within days the activity level , the singing will increase. I would say they are happy. Features: - Made of the non-toxic materials, it is safe for pet birds. - Suitable for all small to medium birds. - Fits most cages. - You can refill the rattan balls with wood or crinkle paper,or hide treats in them . - Please don't mind the paper scraps will fall off.

name: Pervue Pet Products Naturals Preen & Pacify Woodland Harvest Bird Toy 62549
short_description: Promotes exercise and encourages nest-building activity
A combination of bamboo and natural grass makes this toy fun for birds to deconstruct
Straw grass bundles are wound with natural sea grass rope
This bird-safe toy is made using a quick-link, stainless steel wire, sea grass rope, woode, beads and bamboo.
Approximate size: 8" H x 5 3/4” L x 1” W
product_description: Naturals™ Woodland Harvest 62549 from Prevue Pet Products is a multi-sensory activity toy, designed to entertain and engage birds on all levels. Preen & Pacify toys function as stress-reducers and help keep birds active and content. Engaging with a variety of materials and textures is a calming, satisfying and healthy activity. This toy has multiple strands which can be removed and used for nest building activities. Hand-made in Malaysia, this pet-safe toy is made using a quick-link, stainless steel wire, sea grass rope, wooden beads, natural grass and bamboo. Measures approximately 8" high by 5 3/4” long and 1” wide. Toy can vary slightly in shape and size. As always supervise your pet at play. Inspect toy regularly and replace when used or worn.

name: 2 Pcs Wooden Bird Chew Toys - 7.9 Inch Hanging Parrot Toys, with 92 Detachable Corks, Relieve Boredom & Anxiety, Foraging Toys, for Parakeet, Cockatiel, Conure, Budgie, Lovebird
short_description: 【Package Contents】The product package includes 2 hanging bird chewing toys, 8 replacement large corks, and 12 replacement small corks, totaling 92 corks in all. You can easily replace worn cork components as needed.

【100% Natural Materials】The main body is crafted from natural poplar wood, and the corks are made from natural cork oak. Free of harmful substances, it ensures safe chewing for birds. Note: Don't wash the corks.

【Multi-Layer Chewing Structure】Features 36 detachable corks, with 3 large and 6 small corks embedded on each side. Mimics parrots' natural behavior of stripping bark and cracking shells in the wild, catering to birds of varying beak sizes and promoting healthy beak maintenance.

【Reduces Anxiety & Stress】Keeps birds engaged by channeling excess energy into chewing, minimizing feather-plucking and excessive screaming caused by boredom. Natural wood aromas create a calming, forest-like environment to ease stress.
【Stimulates Mental Development】The maze-like cork arrangement replicates foraging challenges in the wild, encouraging exploration and boosting problem-solving skills and cognitive flexibility.

【Easy Installation】Measuring 2.2" L × 2.2" W × 7.9" H, the product features a built-in metal hook for tool-free setup. It effortlessly attaches to any location within the cage, enabling birds to engage in multi-angle interactive play.
【Bird Cage Essential】Replaces metal bell toys (which can harm delicate beaks). Ideal for cockatiels, budgerigars, lovebirds, and other small to medium pet birds as a safe, enriching cage accessory.

name: Bird Toys Parakeet Toys,Large-Sized Parrot Foraging & Shredding Cage Hanging Toys with Seagrass Mat for Budgies,Cockatiels,Lovebirds,Conures Small & Medium Parrots (Colorful with Starfruit (1PCS))
short_description: 🦜 *All-Natural Play Paradise*: Bird toy crafted with eco-friendly seagrass, loofah slices, starfruit accents,bamboo finger traps & rattan stars, our foraging wall parakeet toy offers bird-safe chewing fun.The blend of willow twigs, and acrylic chain creates a multi-level playground that satisfies natural pecking instincts while promoting beak health.

🎨 *Feathered Friend’s Dreamland*: Watch your conures unravel corn husk confetti, shred crinkly paper surprises, and conquer the bamboo finger traps chew challenge! Different interactive zones with various bird toys keep cockatiels engaged for hours – no more bored beak destruction in your quiet afternoons!

🏠 *Bird Cage Space Wizardry*: Engineered at 11.8”x8.2”, this bird vertical wonderland maximizes any sized bird cages. The modular design allows rearranging components to create new bird climbing routes weekly. Includes plastic hooks that securely fasten to most bar spacing while leaving flight room.

📦 *Cage-Ready Instant Fun* – Parakeet toy pre-assembled with two plastic hooks (random colors) for quick hanging in corners,perches or bird cage.Transforms bland cages into tropical jungles – ideal for cockatiels, lovebirds, parakeets, and other medium-small and large parrots.

🎁 *Bird Mental Health Boost* – Reduces feather-plucking and screaming by 78%* in caged birds! The Crinkle Shred Paper whispers mimic natural foliage sounds, while chewable wood pieces and other parrot toys promote beak health and stress relief.

name: Kyouki Bird Toys, Parakeet Toys, Parrot Toy, Conure Hanging Chewable Cardboard Foraging Suitable for Budgies, Cockatiels, Lovebirds, Sun Conures - and Other Small/Medium Parrots (Medium)
short_description: 🌿 Natural & Safe Materials Carefully selected natural materials beloved by parrots - featuring an eco-friendly cardboard base combined with chewable dried starfruit, palm fiber stars, apple wood blocks, corn cob strands, soft silky grass bundles, and natural wooden beads. Completely safe and healthy, allowing your feathered bird friends to fully enjoy exploring and chewing!

🐦 Instinct Stimulation Multi-layer cardboard design incorporates natural elements perfect for bird tearing, rolling, and chewing, simulating wild foraging environments. Parrots can peck at corn cob strands, nudge wooden beads, tear rush grass, or gnaw on apple wood blocks - ensuring hours of interactive fun for your birds every day!
📦 Effortless Installation Kyouki Parrot Toy comes with durable hooks for 3-second bird cage mounting. Perfect for budgies, cockatiels, and lovebirds to instantly create an entertaining playground!

🎁 Anxiety Relief Kyouki parakeet toy helps parakeets release stress and reduce feather-plucking through natural behaviors like chewing carambola and tearing palm fiber stars. The rustling corn cob strands and swaying wooden beads mimic natural sounds to help birds relax.

🎨 Fun Challenges Your birds can explore various play styles - pecking through cardboard holes, dismantling palm fiber stars, or batting at corn cob "toys"! The dynamic hanging design encourages climbing and exploration, keeping parrots active and engaged!
